title: FS: T205 Gold Border Hal Chase Cycle
author: MyGuyTy

posts.post_title: FS: T205 Gold Border Hal Chase Cycle
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T205 Gold Border Hal Chase Cycle back.  SGC 10, very nice eye appeal given the technical grade.  Not an easy front/back combo to find.  $43 delivered, PP F&F preferred.  PM if interested, thanks for looking!
